Description_lang: You have a $rv% chance to be inspired, crafting this recipe with $csv bonus Skill.
You have a $rv% chance to use fewer tradeable reagents.
You have a $rv% chance to gather more of the primary reagent found here.
Increases your ability to spot rare reagents while gathering.
You have a $rv% chance to craft additional items.
You have a $rv% chance to have an ingenious breakthrough when you Concentrate on a craft, refunding $ev% of Concentration spent.
